15:47 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: you're the next RM on the list http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleasePlans/  
15:47 <gdelhumeau> yes  
15:48 <vmassol> next release is 8.1M2  
15:48 <vmassol> 25th of April  
15:48 <vmassol> ie 2 weeks from now  
15:48 <vmassol> note that I think we should also release 7.4.3 soon  
15:49 <vmassol> possibly this week  
15:49 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?filter=14214&jql=category%20in%20(%22Top%20Level%20Projects%22)%20AND%20fixVersion%20in%20(%227.4.3%22)%20AND%20resolution%20in%20(Fixed)  
15:49 <vmassol> we have 46 issues fixed for 7.4.3 already  
15:50 <vmassol> and last release was quite a while ago  
15:50 <vmassol> 29th of Feb (for 7.4.2)  
15:50 <vmassol> so I feel it's high time to release 7.4.3  
15:50 <vmassol> wdyt?  
15:50 <vmassol> (@all)  
15:51 <tmortagne> yes probably  
15:52 <tmortagne> 4 blockers and 3 criticals

15:59 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: question for you. With the getdocuments.vm LT, using the location filter, is it possible to filter only documents in a given space (for example Sandbox). If I use "Sandbox." then it'll also filter pages such as xwiki:MySandbox.WebHome  
16:04 <gdelhumeau> I don't think we can  
16:05 <vmassol> we can only when the space is not a top level one actually  
16:05 <vmassol> and for top-level spaces you can use the "space" filter  
16:06 <vmassol> we can only when the space is not a top level one actually —> ".Sandbox." for ex
